Author: Blue Think
Title: [ANN] ***WITCOIN*** The Coin that Rewards Knowledge! | Token Pre-Sale: Oct 10
Body: The knowledge that witcoin promotes, is the one that moves, the one that passes from one user to another. Your WIT, or registered knowledge, will be rewarded only if it is used by another user to create new knowledge or if he considers that your knowledge has inspired him/her (he will cite you when he/she registers the new knowledge). Registering knowledge just by googling it does not give any reward, because nobody will use it, nobody will "move" it (you will not get any cite) as it is already available by other means in the net. Registering knowledge needs you to spend witcoins so if you register known knowledge not genuine you will be just wasting your money.

Author: JackpotFaucet.com
Title: [ANN] ***WITCOIN*** The Coin that Rewards Knowledge! | Token Pre-Sale: Oct 10
Body: Before blockchain technology‚Ä¶  The Wits research project started around 2015 with a series of studies focused on how the knowledge is shared on the Internet. Before blockchain technology‚Ä¶ In order to promote knowledge sharing, the first studies about rewarding knowledge sharing begun shortly after. View the interview with Dr.Pepllu√≠s de la Rosa one of the first who starts with virtual currencies.  The way internet and online communication works made us understand that any bit of knowledge may be worth to be shared as the inspiration that drives to a great idea can be very tiny. Thus, the term wit, as any kind of clever knowledge created on the net and designed to move at high speed, was born.   Blockchain and Ethereum where inspiring WITCOIN  The years after represent a consolidation of the idea as more resources are dedicated to wits and how to promote them. As a result, several studies are published with implementations of wits as CENTS. A pagerank-like implementations exploring its potential impact to the scientific citations prevailing system. The project gets stuck due to the constraints of the state of the art technologies.  The NIR-VANA project is launched in 2015. The objective of this project is to create an online open innovation ecosystem where users interact and group up with the aim creating and sharing knowledge. The success of this project together with the advent of virtual currencies such as Ethereum and Blockchain technologies represents a relaunch of wits and the possibility of creating a virtual currency managed through the NIR-VANA platform which allows users to create and register knowledge and share it making some profit of it.  The WITCOIN project is created as a platform to enhance knowledge movement, that backs virtual currencies on the Internet powered with Blockchain technologies and implemented as Ethereum tokens.  Blockchain and Ethereum become a reality in WITCOIN  Get the 30% extra benefits in the pre-sale campaign, click here to see how does it works. The future is in front of us, and the future of Witcoin begins in October with the Witcoin Token (WIT) Crowdsale. Alpha versions and demos of the platform will be released during December as an antechamber of the official WITCOIN platform release planned for February 2018.  In March 2018, the NIR-VANA platform will fully deploy Witcoin to register and protect knowledge in general, and IP in particular, as the first (important) use case. Other in the OI will follow after the integration of major online social networks.  During May and July 2018, Witcoin will be integrated in major browsers and mail clients as in major online social networks. We plan that, by 2019, Witcoin will be adopted by general IM, CRM, ERP platforms and start being massively adopted by the publishing industry, associations, big companies, universities, and general public bodies.

Author: JackpotFaucet.com
Title: [ANN] ***WITCOIN*** The Coin that Rewards Knowledge! | Token Pre-Sale: Oct 10
Body: If you have Knowledge worth to share, WITCOIN might interest you. WIT is the coin that rewards Knowledge.   Token pre-sale starts on OCTOBER 10th. Register now to participate!   VISIT OUR WEBSITE   |   READ THE WHITEPAPER   |   READ OUR BLOG  FOLLOW US!    TWITTER   |   FACEBOOK   |   SLACK   |   MEDIUM  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  WHAT IS WITCOIN?  No doubt we are entering in the era of the Knowledge Economy along with so many technological and societal excitement. ‚ÄòNo difference‚Äô from past eras of human history, where people lived the industrial revolution, or the Internet revolution, when knowledge made a difference as it is making now at the dawn in the Knowledge Economy as an extension of the Information Society in the Information Age led by innovation.   We think of knowledge as the currency that enables everybody to get the best of the new global economy. This new kind of currency enables anyone and everyone to participate or contribute with knowledge as an asset or capital.  There is growing awareness that a sort of Knowledge-Based Capital (KBC) is driving economic growth and is gaining prevalence in today‚Äôs global marketplace. KBC includes a broad range of intangible assets, such as research, data, software, and design skills, which express human ingenuity. Unlike labour, natural resources, and physical capital, KBC is the only factor of production that will not suffer from scarcity. The message remains clear: to promote long-term growth and the jobs of tomorrow, public and private bodies, or self-organizing communities, must ensure a policy framework that helps businesses invest in KBC, companies to adopt KBC-friendly policies, and individuals to become accustomed to making a living with their knowledge.   KBC requires multiparty collaboration to yield fruits. This is, involving other parties (AKA peers) when developing new products, services, and technologies. These peers are knowledge providers and also consumers.  Therefore, the Witcoin platform is a proposal of acknowledgement and reward of peers doing Knowledge Appraisal and Transfer. The reward is with Witcoins (WIT), a token based cryptocurrency backed by knowledge.   A Wit is by definition ‚Äústuff that makes sense (to someone else).‚Äù Knowledge is considered to make sense when it proves useful to the peer community, and acknowledged by citing and referring it. These acts of acknowledgement will be confirmed by the Witcoin platform, backed by Blockchain technology, and therefore the author(s) will be rewarded in WIT currency.  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .   HOW WITCOIN WORKS?  Wits are knowledge that makes sense. Knowledge definitely makes sense when someone else cites or reuses it. There is a potential risk on this, because once knowledge is disclosed, it can be copied an infinite number of times, and with such abundance, its value tends to zero. Witcoin solves the problem of converting knowledge into currency because there is an effort to absorb this knowledge. This effort becomes an indirect measure of knowledge, as the more knowledge there is, the more there is to absorb. Thus, Witcoin is related to the effort of digesting knowledge that makes sense to someone as a measure of the absorption of knowledge because it has made a difference to somebody. Therefore, the more some disclosed knowledge makes a difference to someone else, the greater its acknowledgment in WIT, which are created specifically to reward the usefulness of knowledge.    In this context, Witcoins are designed to promote and reward individuals for the validation of their ideas, creations, and activity with IP assets. Whenever a user cites someone else‚Äôs Wits, the owner(s) will be rewarded to recognize their contribution and their knowledge usefulness.   Witcoin will resolve the value of Wits by the following mechanism: Witcoin make possible to register Wits (knowledge) on the Blockchain. Then, it will be recognized that a wit WA created by X is useful to Y when the latter registers a new wit WB explicitly citing WA. WB might be: 1) a post in a collaboration space; 2) any content ideated or created thanks to the exposure of WA to Y; 3) a partnership agreement among different partners where WA is mentioned; or 4) a scientific publication where WA is cited. For further details please read our Whitepaper.  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .  THE WIT TOKEN   The initial supply will be 288.000.000 WIT.   1.000.000 WIT will be distributed on the PRE-SALE at advantageous rates.   Up to 8.000.000 WIT will be distributed during the 1st TOKEN CROWDSALE phase.   The rest of the initial supply of WIT will be distributed during the 2nd and 3rd phases planned in 2018.   There will be an additional supply based on the activity in the future Witcoin platform, details are available on our Whitepaper. oooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo   We accept the following coins: ETH, BTC, XMR, DASH, LTC, BCH, BNT and ANT.   The minimum transaction amount for participation on the sale is the amount equivalent to 100 WIT. There is no maximum transaction amount.   Pre-sale will start on Tuesday 10th of October at 07:00 GMT   Access to the pre-sale will be given prior to registration. Register Now!   Discount bonus rates will be applied on the PRE-SALE depending on the achieved goal:  ooooooo 0 ‚Äì 250,000 WIT -> 30% discount (1 ETH = 1,250 WIT) 250,001 ‚Äì 500,000 WIT -> 25% discount (1 ETH = 1,175 WIT) 500,001 ‚Äì 750,000 WIT -> 20% discount (1 ETH = 1,100 WIT) 750,002 ‚Äì 1,000,000 WIT -> 15% discount (1 ETH = 1,000 WIT)  We will apply additional bonus equivalent to the number of tokens bought in a single transaction:  ooooooo 0 ‚Äì 8,000 WIT = no bonus 8,001 ‚Äì 80,000 WIT = 5% additional WIT 80,001 ‚Äì 800,000 WIT = 10% additional WIT > 800,001 WIT = 20% additional WIT oooooooooo oooooooooooooooooooooooo   . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .   PROJECT ROADMAP    . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .   BOUNTY PROGRAM   Check our Bounty Program HERE!   . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .   THE TEAM   Dr. V√≠ctor Torres   /   R+D Manager  Dr. V√≠ctor Mu√±oz   /   Software Developer  Dr. Andr√©s El-Fakdi   /   Assistant Professor & Researcher  Xavi Tarr√®s   /   Senior Project Manager  Adri√† Llorens   /   Software Developer  David Bruguera   /   Software Developer   ADVISORY BOARD  Dr. Pepllu√≠s de la Rosa   /    Erik Vollst√§dt   /    Riccardo Bonazzi   /   Online CV  Rogelio Segovia   /    James Stodder   /    Marc Torrent   /     POST TRANSLATIONS    SPANISH:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2214424   /   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2214295  CHINESE:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2222215  HEBREW:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2220070  TURKISH:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2222411  RUSSIAN:   https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2236939  RUSSIAN(MMGP):   http://mmgp.ru/showthread.php?t=539049

Title: [ANN] ***WITCOIN*** The Coin that Rewards Knowledge! | Token Pre-Sale: Oct 10
Body: for lol question, what is the soft cap and the hard cap for the pre sale? and what platform? and any planning where this token will be listing

Author: Witcoin1
Title: [ANN] ***WITCOIN*** The Coin that Rewards Knowledge! | Token Pre-Sale: Oct 10
Body: Hi Chronos angel!  We have fixed a Soft Cap for the pre-sale at 1.000.000 WIT. If we reach this goal we will continue to reserve WIT orders but with the sale conditions applicable at the token sale. Our Hard Cap for the pre-sale + 1st sale is 8.000.000 WIT.  About the sites listing the token, we are in contact with several providers right now and the listings will be announced in the next days. We will be posting all the upcoming information in this same thread.  Thank you for your support!
